name: Princess Goblin Story
description:
A silly little game about a princess turned into a goblin, and their frantic story to return to their body. Filled with fattening,

  • No actual combat to this RPG, but there is an eating contest.
  • Trainable stats and a home you can slightly customize
  • Jobs, contests, being a guinea pig for transformative medicines and more
  • Lots of missing features due to time crunch!

Game Jam Version 1.0: Expect bugs and otherwise. Current issues include:
Grey Dragon Pub is more or less entirely incomplete, Happy Ferret Inn does not sell food, and probably several more!
